title: Detemine if Multipliable
text: Two matrices are Multipliable(able to be multiplied) if their inner dimensions are the same. Since A is 2x2 and B is 2x2, the matrices can be multiplied.

title: Following the Algorithm
text: Follow the algorithm for multiplying matrices to get the final matrix.

title: Matrix Multiplication Operations
text: The operations for multiplying the matrices are as follows: $$\begin{bmatrix} -10\times40+20\times-20 & -10\times10+20\times30 \\ 5\times40+25\times-20 & 5\times10+25\times30 \end{bmatrix}$$

title: Simplifying Operations
text: Simplify these operations: $$\begin{bmatrix} -10\times40+20\times-20 & -10\times10+20\times30 \\ 5\times40+25\times-20 & 5\times10+25\times30 \end{bmatrix}$$. What do you get as your final answer?
